entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
